definition: to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
to blame/to reprove/to reprimand/to expel/to oust/to reconnoiter/(of territory) to expand/saline marsh

sentences.english: He was chided by the superior because he had violated the company's bylaws.
sentences.chinese: 他因違反公司的規章制度遭到上級的揮斥。
